title: S1: The Fog - Web Exclusive
description: Bruce Gernon and Rob MacGregor join Darkness Radio to tell a mysterious tale.  Bruce took off in his aircraft and flew into the Bermuda Triangle and lost time and 100 miles, and that is where the story STARTS! Listen in to hear a wild tale of vortices, lost time, and visitors?
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
